item.description:
----------------------------------------------------------------
This Saturday, June 16 at about 5 p.m. I am having a small get-
together on my roof deck to celebrate my birthday. I'd love it
if you could come. It's BYOB.

98 Day Street (enter around the corner on Bynner St.)
Jamaica Plain

RSVP to marjorie_k@yahoo.com or call:
617-522-3757 (answering machine)
508-577-5251 (cell phone)

group.name: The Chestnut Hill Walking Meetup Group

item.name: Marjorie's Birthday Celebration
